frontmatter.title: Writing a Compiler with Honeycomb
frontmatter.description: After reading about parser combinator libraries, I started to write my own! I eventually got it into a working state, and published it on crates.io under the name `honeycomb`.

frontmatter.title: Object Oriented Shell Scripting
frontmatter.description: While PowerShell can be cumbersome and ugly, its take on object orientation is very useful.
